EndogenousConcepts.label: Names of endogenous concepts, not including units (countries, ...)

Units.label: Names of panel units (countries, industries, etc.)

ShockConcepts.label: Names of structural shock concepts, not including units (countries, ...)

Order.label: Autoregressive order of the VAR model

Intercept.label: True if the model includes an intercept (constant) term

EstimationSpan.label: Date range for estimation, not including initial conditions

IdentificationHorizon.label: Number of periods for shock responses
